CustomField.description: Indicates the type of news that is being added. Internal represents a news article pasted into Salesforce and an External would be a link to an article posted somewhere on the internet.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the type of news that is being added. Internal represents a news article pasted into Salesforce and an External would be a link to an article posted somewhere on the internet.
CustomField.label: Type
